EmailTemplate.name: Trial Onboarding Experiment - GTM-1296 / GTM-1274 - OLD.ACQ - InExperienced - Da
EmailTemplate.subject: Set up your store before your trial ends
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
You're so close — quickly launch your online store. Pick a plan that's right for you. Log in to your control panel <[[https://login.bigcommerce.com/login?utm_medium=email&utm_source=Trial+Onboarding&utm_campaign=InExperienced&utm_term=Day+14+Email+8&utm_content=Control+Panel]]> Your free trial ends soon Set up your store <[[https://login.bigcommerce.com/login?utm_medium=email&utm_source=Trial+Onboarding&utm_campaign=InExperienced&utm_term=Day+14+Email+8&utm_content=Set+Up+Store]]> Don't lose your store
We noticed that you haven't launched your online store yet. You can set it up and open for business in just a few easy steps by logging in now.
Or select a subscription plan and get the time you need to finish building your store.
Select your plan » <[[https://manage.bigcommerce.com/account/stores/upgrade]]>
{{my.Litmus Tracker 19:default=editme}}
